Romney is making a base decision he's

romney-ryan ticket as bad for seniors

the country

Ashley Parker who covers the Romney

really well on the campaign trail in
addition to the policy considerations
Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan had an easy
and instant rapport natural chemistry
from day one I spent some time watching

watching them was like watching a

Ryan took Romney to culvers for butter

Ryan even conspired with Mitt Romney's
